name: dfareporting_inventoryItems_list
description: Retrieves a list of inventory items, possibly filtered. This method supports paging.

profileId.description: User profile ID associated with this request.

ids.description: Select only inventory items with these IDs.

inPlan.description: Select only inventory items that are in plan.

maxResults.description: Maximum number of results to return.

orderId.description: Select only inventory items that belong to specified orders.

pageToken.description: Value of the nextPageToken from the previous result page.

siteId.description: Select only inventory items that are associated with these sites.

sortField.description: Field by which to sort the list.

type.description: Select only inventory items with this type.

fields.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

key.description: API key. Your API key identifies your project and provides you with API access, quota, and reports. Required unless you provide an OAuth 2.0 token.

oauth_token.description: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

prettyPrint.description: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

quotaUser.description: Available to use for quota purposes for server-side applications. Can be any arbitrary string assigned to a user, but should not exceed 40 characters.

$ul: **kind**: Identifies what kind of resource this is. Value: the fixed string "dfareporting#inventoryItemsListResponse".
**nextPageToken**: Pagination token to be used for the next list operation.
